September 20, 2024

Two papers will be presented at EMNLP 2024. Congrats to Esther Gan, Yiran Zhao, Hongfu Liu, Yuxi Xie and other collaborators!
Reasoning Robustness of LLMs to Adversarial Typographical Errors
